instructionText.#cdata-section: Click Start to take the final assessment and see how much you have learned.

PassText.CongtateText: Congratulations! You have scored % and successfully completed this module. Select Exit to close this course and select any other module/course.
PassText.InstructionText: Click on the EXIT button to exit this course and return to the main menu.

FailText.FailSubTitle:
Sorry! You score Y% and could not complete this course successfully. You are recommended to go through this module and attempt the assessment again.

All the best!

Retake.RetakeInstructionText: Click Retake Assessment to reattempt the assessment, or click Exit to exit this course and return to the main menu.
